entry.title: [Talk] Demystifying LLMs: How to Use GenAI Effectively (to keep your job)

link.title: [Talk] Demystifying LLMs: How to Use GenAI Effectively (to keep your job)

entry.summary: Abstract: Large Language Models (LLMs) like ChatGPT and Gemini are reshaping how people in every field approach problem-solving, from brainstorming ideas to debugging complex systems. This talk will explain, in straightforward terms, how LLMs work, what they‚Äôre good at, and where their boundaries lie.
